thread.title: Christine
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Christine

author: Christine
title: Christine
text:
I purchased the BBG ebooks on the website. I went with the ebooks because of the 80% discount, it was totally worth it. The guides were emailed to me within minutes of purchase, which was great.
I am 14 weeks in now, and I really love the workouts. The circuits are only 30 minutes, so it is easy to fit into my schedule. Plus, the workouts are varied, so it never gets boring. I have already recommended BBG to all of my freinds
